messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yeah, there's been a bunch of gunshots in my house, and I think a bunch of people were shot.
Where at?
2112 East Republican.
2112 East Republican?
Yeah.
In your house?
Yes, in my house.
Okay, stay on the line.
Okay.
Are you okay?
I'm fine. I saw a bunch of people walking my friend. It looked like a drive-by or something, but then I heard a bunch of gunshots.
How many people are shot?
At least four or five. It’s really messed up. There are a bunch of people drunk.
Where are the suspects?
I don't know. He was outside. I don't have any description.
Do you have any vehicle description?
No, I don't. I've been inside.
Do you have roommates in your home?
Yes, there are six of us in total.
What is your first name?
There was just another gunshot. I’m hiding in the basement with two other people.
Okay, so you don't know what’s going on now?
I can't see anything. I don't know if anybody else is talking to another operator.
We have a lot of calls right now, but I'm going to keep you on the phone because you're inside the house.
Yes, I’m with two other people. They had nothing to do with it and just ran down here.
Do you know your roommates?
Yes, I know every single one of them.
I don't want you leaving the room. You need to stay in there. Hold on just one second, okay?
Okay.
Can you tell me exactly where in the house you are so officers can find you?
There's two ways to get here. One is by the back door. If you go all the way downstairs into the basement, we're in a room there.
Are you in the basement, in the back of the basement?
Yes, in the back of the basement. It’s like a mother-in-law suite.
How many of you are there?
There are three of us back here in total, including two other males.
So, there are three more roommates upstairs?
Yes, five of us were here. One isn't home. I saw one of them outside in a big fur coat.
I don't want you to move. I just want you to stay where you're at.
Okay. I'm kind of drunk, and this is freaking me out.
The other two guys are still there with you, right?
Yes.
Can you hear officers coming through?
I hear them telling people to put their hands up.
It's okay. They’re not going to freak out on you. Stay calm.
I hope they don't freak out on me. They can't see us from behind the door.
Is it officers you hear?
Sounds like it. Sounds like there are other people outside the door, though.
Hello? I'm on the phone with the 911 operator.
Okay, just follow their instructions.
I'm right here. I'm on the phone with 911.
Everyone, hands up! Just follow their instructions.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
Someone’s been shot at my friend's house. We were upstairs, and I heard several gunshots.
What’s the address?
I don't know the address. I can't look it up right now.
Who else is in the house with you?
My girlfriend. We’re hiding in the upstairs bathroom.
Was the shooting in the house you're in?
Yes, downstairs. He tried to get into the bathroom.
Stay on the line with me. What is your name?
My name is...
What's your cell phone number?
This is my girlfriend's phone.
Is she there with you? Is she injured?
Yes, she is here. She is not injured.
Stay on the line with me. What are you hearing now?
I hear police officers talking downstairs.
Stay on the line, okay? Are you still in the bathroom upstairs?
Yes.
Is the door locked?
Yes.
Are you hearing officers telling you to come out?
Yes, I think so.
Stay on the line with me for a second.
Are you injured? Is your girlfriend injured?
No. No, she is okay.
The officers are coming up there now. Tell them where you are.
We’re in the bathroom. The door has bullet holes. Let me unlock it.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
Someone is shooting people at 2112 East Republican.
Are they inside or outside?
They’re outside, on our porch.
Who did they shoot?
I'm not sure. I just saw shots.
Did they drive by or walk?
They were just on the porch.
What's your address again?
2112 East Republican.
Did you get a good look at the shooter?
He was a white male, about six foot five.
Do you know his name? How old is he?
Late 20s, maybe a little shorter than 6'5.
What was he wearing?
Regular clothes, like jeans and a shirt.
Did you see what color shirt?
I don't remember. Not wearing a hat.
Did he come in a vehicle?
Probably, but I didn’t see it.
Thank you. We have officers responding.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
There was a bunch of fireworks or gunshots, and there are people hurt.
What’s the address?
2112 East Republican.
Is that a house or apartment?
It’s a house.
And someone is shot?
Yes.
Do you see anyone injured?
Yes, there are males and females injured.
Is the person who did the shooting still there?
I don't know.
Okay, we have responders on the way.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
Yeah, we got someone else over here. Someone's been shot.
Is someone in need of medics?
Yes.
Okay, I’m getting the medics on the line.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
The police just got here. We have one person at our doorstep who has been shot.
What is your address?
2112 East Republican.
Do you see the medics?
No, not yet.
Okay, stay on the line with me.
The shooter might have shot himself.
Do you see the medics anywhere?
No, not yet.
Okay, they're on the way.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
I need the police. There are shots fired across the street from me.
Do you see someone with a gun?
No, I can hear gunshots. There was a party. I see someone down in the yard.
What color is the house across the street?
It’s blue.
One of our cars just pulled up.
There is a man down in the yard.
Did you get a description of the shooter?
No, I heard a shotgun blast, then saw the man in the yard.
I will let the officers know.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
There are shots fired on East Republican. Someone is down on the porch.
Are they still firing shots?
Yes.
Did you see who's shooting?
No.
Okay, we have police in the area.
This is 9-1-1. What's your emergency?
I've been hearing gunshots all morning, and there are people hurt.
Do you know how many people have been shot?
I think six people might have been shot.
Did you hear the shooter?
Yes, I could hear the shots even more after the initial one.
We have responders on the way.
